document_data.name: Marjoram
document_data.mainbody: '''Marjoram''' was a common type of [[herb]] seasoning found in the Realms.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|''Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue'']] sold majoram at a price of 5 [[copper piece]]s per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}} in its "Aurora's Larder" section.
* Marjoram could be found for sale in the markets of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable Marjoram Products: * Powdered marjoram was commonly used in the [[elf|elven]] dish [[Vaervren]] to season vegetables.{{Cite web/theedverse/2023-02-22 - Vaervren}}
document_data.Notable Users: * [[The Painted Boat]], a restaurant in the [[Dragon Reach]] off the southern edge of the [[Ravens Bluff/Harbor District|Harbor District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]], commonly kept majoram stocked in the kitchen's drying rack.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/79/The Living City: The Painted Boat Restaurant|15}}
